name: StudyBattle
description: A website that allows you to upload study documents and 'fight' monsters that ask you revision questions as you work your way up a series of child and parent nodes to the top
language: Python for the backend, MySQL database, Next/react frontend and maybe typescript too
done: User is able to upload docs
Once the users study materials are complete, you can visualise a structure almost like a binary search tree, with child and parent nodes

You start at the bottom nodes and can only progress upon defeating all children of a parent node. Lower nodes have easier information, higher nodes may ask you to compare and contrast or explain a topic like the monster is 5
When an answer is submitted, it must be checked against a series of ai generated criteria based solely off the study materials given. More marks for the closer you are
architecture_notes: I would like to use AWS in my project. Maybe Lambda, API Gateway etc..
expected_scale: Must go up to around 20 users a day, and be able to store up to 500 'battles' minimum
avoid: No dynamodb, no need for a login page just yet
